Wayfarer [i](If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} this turn, discover L'Or.)[/i]
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
{3}: Voyager's Passage becomes a 5/5 Elemental creature with vigilance and trample until end of turn. It's still a land. Activate only if you've discovered L'Or.
